topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
Sticking with the dub, since I like the dub. Burn me at the stake. 
 
This is also the first time I'm watching the series fully, I've seen bits and pieces of it many times before but not the whole thing. 
 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
[spoiler]THEY SPEND SO LONG TALKING ABOUT FOOD 
 
The cold vs. flu thing: "You are technically correct... the best KIND of correct." 
 
I like the bait and switch with Konata coming to Kagami's house when she's sick, then they throw you for a loop when she's all "I thought she was into animes and all that stuff, I didn't think she'd be the kind of person to comfort a friend" and then "nope just here to copy your homework" :P

"I'M STILL SHORT." Yep, first laugh right there. This is gonna be worth my time.

"HOW DARE YOU BE HAPPIER THAN THE REST OF US" And second laugh right after. Yep, definitely gonna stick with this one.

goddammit Guile get out of my animes XD

So Lucky Channel is a thing... Akira, your Revy is showing- wait... THIS ISN'T MARYKE HENDRIKSE? But it sounds so much like Revy! XD[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So this episode was pretty good, a couple good laughs to start us off, nothing spectacular yet though.
